Description:
The FHIR DeviceUseStatement resource records the use of a healthcare-related device by a patient. This resource supports statements for implantable medical devices.

The search interaction enables the client to query for devices use statements based on a specified set of information. The DeviceUseStatement Search endpoint allows clients to establish an identifier for a statement without previously receiving unique identification from the server for the statement.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

bodySite.Name: bodySite
bodySite.Description: The location of an implant in the body.

Laterality.Name: extension
Laterality.Description: Laterality adds information about body side to the anatomic location, for example left.

HealthcareProvider.Name: extension
HealthcareProvider.Description: Returns the organization where the device was implanted.

HealthProfessional.Name: extension
HealthProfessional.Description: Returns the practitioner who implanted the device.

whenUsed.Name: extension
whenUsed.Description: The date of the implant and explant for a device.
